name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Victory II
description:
Hyperdimension Neptunia Victory II is a RPG game developed by Compile Heart. It came out on 23-04-2015. It was published by Nippon Ichi Software. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
Hyperdimension Neptunia Victory II is available on PlayStation 3.
Chihiro Fujioka, Kenji Kaneko, Takeshi Abo and Takeshi Toriumi scored the game.
